Alpha's Command.name: Alpha's Command
Alpha's Command.flavor: You don’t even have to snarl a command; your pack member takes your meaning from your bloody fangs.
Alpha's Command.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you command one of your summoned creatures to make one of its standard action attacks. If you don’t have a summoned creature present, roll a d20. If you roll 10 or higher, one ally within 5 squares of you can charge or make a basic attack as a free action.

Full Pack.name: Full Pack
Full Pack.flavor: You and your summoned creature howl in unison.
Full Pack.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use a minor action once per round to command one of your summoned creatures to make one of its standard action attacks.
